name: simple_agent_web_search
description: AI assistant that grounds answers using Google search and always cites sources
useCases: Get quick answers to general questions with reliable sources
Research market trends and competitor activities with citations
Track industry news and regulatory changes affecting your business
Gather data for executive briefings and board presentations
samplePrompts: What is the current market cap and stock price of NVIDIA as of today? Include recent earnings highlights and analyst price targets.
Find the official documentation on React Server Components. Show me the latest best practices and migration guides from the React team.
Compare the security features of AWS S3 vs Google Cloud Storage. Focus on encryption at rest, access controls, and compliance certifications.
What are the recent news about OpenAI's GPT-5 updates? Find the latest feature announcements and API changes from the last 2 weeks.
author: Albert Folch
